availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
State of Pennsylvania
City & County of Philada } S.S.

I. Wm V Archer duly appointed by the Governer of the State of Kentucky a Commissioner for the State of Kentucky resident at Philadelphia in the State of Pennsylvania; do Solemnly Swear that I will well and faithfully execute and perform all the duties of such Commissioner under and by virtue of the Land of the said State of Kentucky

figure.ab:
ARTHUR M BURTON
COMMISSIONER
PHILADELPHIA PENNY

body.p: Sworn and subscribed me this seventeenth day of September AD 1860

Arthur M. Burton
Commissioner for Kentucky
in Pennsylvania

Pennsylvania
Comr of Deeds
Wm V. Archer
Oath
